# Question 1

```{r}
dat1 <- read.csv("../HW01Data/saltBP.csv")
lm1 <- lm(BP ~ saltLevel, data = dat1)
```

### Part A

```{r}
sum1 <- summary(lm1)
beta1 <- round(sum1$coefficients[2,1],3)
bh1 <- mean((dat1 %>% filter(saltLevel == 1))$BP) - mean((dat1 %>% filter(saltLevel == 0))$BP)
```

Here it is shown that $\hat{\beta}_1 = \overline{BP}_1 - \overline{BP}_2$ as `r beta1` = `r round(bh1,3)`.
